title: Introduction to Programming: Foundational Skill Development Through Code Analysis and Extension

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental computer literacy and logical reasoning abilities
context.additional_context: Optimizing smartphone-based learning environments, with a focus on intensive hands-on practice during face-to-face sessions.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to analyze given source code and explain its core logic.
Learners will be able to modify variables/conditional statements in existing programs to write code reflecting requirements.
Learners will be able to design a modular code structure through functional extension requirements.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
